# subitems

**Instance Property**

The subitems of the grouped toolbar item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var subitems: [NSToolbarItem] { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSToolbarItemGroup] instance has an empty array of subitems.

## Related Documentation

- **Toolbar Programming Topics for Cocoa**

## Working with subitems

- **selectedIndex**: The index value for the most recently selected subitem of a grouped toolbar item.
- **isSelected(at:)**: Indicates whether a specified index is currently selected.
- **setSelected(_:at:)**: Sets the selected state of a subitem in a grouped toolbar item.
